title: What is the best font making software?
content:
What is considered industry standard?

It used to be Fontographer, but I think there’s a better one now?

 [‹ Un-needed Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20080620032051/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44441 "Go to previous forum topic") [So I want to buy The Fleuron ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080620032051/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44443 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Christopher Dean
